TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlobalCatalog extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController

Docs.summary: The GlobalCatalog class represents a global catalog server. A global catalog server is a domain controller that hosts a replica of the global catalog.

Docs.summary: Demotes this domain controller from a global catalog server.
Docs.returns: A object that represents the domain controller.
Docs.exception: The domain controller is not a global catalog server or the global catalog server has already been disabled.
The current object has been disposed.

Docs.summary: Not supported for the class because this domain controller is already a global catalog server.
Docs.returns: Not applicable. This method will always throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
Docs.exception: The domain controller is already a global catalog server.
The current object has been disposed.
